Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp

Interface TokenManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CapTokenManager, OathTokenManager, VicTokenManager
    public interface TokenManager
    The manager to create and retrieve tokens. To retrieve a token manager.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  TokenManager.TokenCreationCallback
      This interface can be used by the application, when they call createToken() method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Set<String> getTokenNames()
      Gets the available token names.
      boolean removeToken​(Token token)
      Removes an existing token.
      boolean removeToken​(String name)
      Removes an existing token.

    • Method Detail

      • getTokenNames

        Set<String> getTokenNames()
                   throws IdpStorageException
        Gets the available token names. An empty list is returned if no token is found.
        Returns:
        the collection of available token names, in form of Set <String>.
        Throws:
        IdpStorageException - when database operation failed.

      • removeToken

        boolean removeToken​(String name)
             throws IdpException
        Removes an existing token.
        Parameters:
        name - the token name
        Returns:
        true if it existed and was removed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IdpStorageException - when database operation failed.
        IdpException

      • removeToken

        boolean removeToken​(Token token)
             throws IdpException
        Removes an existing token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token to remove
        Returns:
        true if it existed and was removed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IdpException - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below.
        IdpStorageException - when database operation failed.
        IdpAuthException - when Authentication module assets removal failed.
